text: The International Consortium of Investigative Journalists (ICIJ) is an independent international organization of more than 200 investigative journalists and 100 media organizations in over 70 countries. It was created in 1997 by the Center for Public Integrity in Washington, D.C., United States. ==References== Category:1997 establishments in the United States Category:Journalism
title: International Consortium of Investigative Journalists
